description.ko: 날카로운 흑요석의 가장자리와 부서진 현실의 디지털 정적이 만나는 혼돈과 구조의 춤.
description.en: A dance of chaos and structure where sharp obsidian edges meet the digital static of a broken reality.

prompt: A massive, fractured obsidian monolith suspended in a white digital void, perpetually shattering and reforming with glitch art aesthetics. Sharp geometric abstraction with obsidian shards, scanlines, and monochrome complexity. 8k, raytracing, sharp angles. The lighting is harsh and high-contrast, utilizing dramatic shadows and raytraced reflections on the black glass surfaces. Detailed textures of digital noise and fragmented scanlines integrated into the 3D form, rendered with global illumination in a stark black and white environment.
